title: Looking for people to play with
body: I'm looking for some people in community to play League with in both ranked and norms. I'm bronze1 in solo/duo and bronze3 in flex and would love to have a group of people to play with and talk to over discord!.

replies.body:
I'm keen man, add me.
I'm a silver 3 adc main but can play everything!

Australisch
I'm at the same elo as you. I main support and I can play any role aside from top to an extent. Feel free to add me; my username is checkeredartist ^^. discord is cowiofplebianberip#3351
Everyone who is interested add me to your list
I would volunteer, but I'm so much lower/worse that I'd most likely bring you down :(
And your match history looks brilliant!, i have no clue what you are worrying about.
Your skill doesnt matter at all dont worry, i just want a group of people to have fun with on the game! :)
